thread.title: Communications Intern - Athletics - College Sports

title: Communications Intern - Athletics - College Sports
text: Assist in the publicity and promotion of our UniversityÂ’s 22-sport NCAA Division I athletics program. Writing and editing press releases, game stories, game programs and media guides...   Since your site launched in 2000, WorkInSports.com has been the go to place for USA Baseball when we are looking to fill full-time openings and internships. Your reputation throughout the sports industry as a vital tool for job seekers and employers is well deserved. Thanks again! David Perkins
